Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, choose one – 
• Create a Vial token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this and another permanent: Draw a card. Activate only during your turn.”)[/i]
• Create an Idol token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
